title: Forza Milan
author: VD
content_html:
I like the rossoneri over Barca by a 1-0 mark in the first leg tonight. Tomorrow, tune in for a running diary of Arsenal’s showdown with Villareal. I’m hoping to see my two favorite teams go head-to-head in the final, if so, mi dispiace but I have to stick with the Gunners.

In preparation for tomorrow night, I watched Thierry Henry’s first through 40th goals for Arsenal this afternoon. I’ll watch the next sixty tomorrow, as Spacebunny was kind enough to buy me the Centurions DVD. (100 goals each, Bergkamp and Henry.) Speaking of which, it was a delight to see Dennis score the putaway goal in his testimonial game on Saturday. If this is his final year, I would so much like to see them send him off a European Champion.
content_text:
I like the
rossoneri
over Barca by a 1-0 mark in the first leg tonight.  Tomorrow, tune in for a running diary of Arsenal’s showdown with Villareal.  I’m hoping to see my two favorite teams go head-to-head in the final, if so,
mi dispiace
but I have to stick with the Gunners.
In preparation for tomorrow night, I watched Thierry Henry’s first through 40th goals for Arsenal this afternoon.  I’ll watch the next sixty tomorrow, as Spacebunny was kind enough to buy me the Centurions DVD.   (100 goals each, Bergkamp and Henry.)  Speaking of which, it was a delight to see Dennis score the putaway goal in his testimonial game on Saturday.  If this is his final year, I would so much like to see them send him off a European Champion.
